BODY.TITLE: TAC GIA - TAC PHAM
BODY.NOIDUNG: - Nguyen Trai : Sinh nam (1380-1442) , que Chi Linh - Hai Duong, Tac pham :
BODY.THO: Tuan kiet nhu sao buoi som
Nhan tai nhu la mua thu
Viec bon tau thieu ke do dan
Noi duy ac hiem nguoi ban bac
BODY.NOIDUNG: - Nguyen Du : Sinh nam (1766-1820), que Nghi Xuan - Ha Tinh, Tac pham:
BODY.THO: Nguoi len ngua ke chia bao
Rung phong thu da nhuom mau quang sang
Dam hong bui cuon chinh an
Trong nguoi da khuat may ngan dau xanh
Ruou ngon khong co ban hien
Khong mua khong phai khong tien khong mua
Cau tho nghi dan do khong viet
Viet dua ai ai biet ma dua
